patthana23.23:1.1: Nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.23:2.1: Nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.23:3.1: Nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
